block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: espSnap 库允许用户更改 URL - 默认为 http://espsnap.local/ 注意：如果用户遗漏了后面的“/”，自定义块将在后面添加“/” espSnap library allows user to change the url - default is http://espsnap.local/ note : the custom block will add "/" at the back if missed by user
连接成功后会报告 espSnap 的 IP 地址 否则返回空白（NULL）it will reports the IP address of espSnap on successful connection otherwise, it will return blank (NULL)

单击此处检查连接 如果这是新连接，它将使用 url 查找 espSnap 并设置变量“espSnapServer” - 如果连接正常，则返回“true” - 如果连接不正常，则返回“false” click on this to check for connection if this is a new connection, it will look for espSnap using the url and set the variable "espSnapServer" - return "true" if connection ok - return "false" if connection not ok
变量 espSnapServer 用于存储 espSnap 的 IP 地址 a variable espSnapServer is used to store the IP address of espSnap
连接到 espSnap，如果成功则显示 IP 地址 connect to espSnap and show IP address if success
